mapper.insert: insert into airport (airport_id, name, IATA, ICAO, level, level2, navigation_date, type, city, terminal_area, number_seat, operat_agencies, phone1, phone2, email, website ) values (#{airportId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iata,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{level2,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{navigationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalArea,jdbcType=REAL}, #{numberSeat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operatAgencies,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update airport set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IATA = #{iata,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICAO = #{icao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=CHAR}, level2 = #{level2,jdbcType=CHAR}, navigation_date = #{navigationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, terminal_area = #{terminalArea,jdbcType=REAL}, number_seat = #{numberSeat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operat_agencies = #{operatAgencies,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone1 = #{phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone2 = #{phone2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where airport_id = #{airportId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select airport_id, name, IATA, ICAO, level, level2, navigation_date, type, city, terminal_area, number_seat, operat_agencies, phone1, phone2, email, website from airport where airport_id = #{airportId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select airport_id, name, IATA, ICAO, level, level2, navigation_date, type, city, terminal_area, number_seat, operat_agencies, phone1, phone2, email, website from airport
